channel.desc: Law students Ted and Stuart's friendship is tested when they face off in a mock trial; in the present, Stuart faces a crisis as his doubts about his client mount.

channel.title: 2 Broke Girls
channel.desc: Sophie's wedding shower is interrupted by a hostage situation. Max and Caroline's cupcake business gets unwanted attention when a tenant is arrested wearing their company's shirt.
